name: Hit 'n Miss
overview: This shooting gallery game is made for younger players. There are seven different types levels, with different ways of how the player should do the shooting. One level requires the player to time shots to drop apples on passing targets, other levels has straightforward shooting of moving targets in the shortest time or otherwise shoot only specific targets. When a level ends, bonus points are adding for the time remaining. If the time runs out or the conditions for shooting specific targets are not met, then the game is over.
